About

Hello world!

I am an PhD student of Gwangju Institute of Science and Technology(GIST). My research fields is about Machine learning and Computer Vision.
I will use this place to post anything that I want to share such as my favorite, hobbies and something related to my research topic. I’ve planned to write them in either Korean or English.

About Me

Hello everyone! My name is Kwangjin Yoon[윤광진] from South Korea. Thank you!
